Text.val: ... define \NEW directory to move the final zipfile
... user Upper() function, directories in GNRD are not always defined consequently uppercase
... check if \NEW directory exists, if not it'll be created
... more than 2 files detected, skip zip (has to be first analyzed manualy by operator)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Problem with ZIP of GFRS files (see jobjournal BXA497FTP)')
MlsTrans('Move zipfile to the new directory failed')

Text.val: ... directory not defined or does not exist
... failed to read directory from GNRD --> MSGW
... and finally delete the current handled file if copy was successfull
